title: SkinsRestorer.无法使用MYSQL
author: lian123456
txt_content:
[SkinsRestorer] Can't connect to MySQL! Disabling SkinsRestorer.


SkinsRestorer.使用MYSQL报错

replies.author: V逍遥
replies.txt_content: 检查一下Mysql配置 使用Navicat for MySQL等工具尝试能否连接Mysql

replies.author: lian123456
replies.txt_content:
V逍遥 发表于 2019-7-12 01:03
检查一下Mysql配置 使用Navicat for MySQL等工具尝试能否连接Mysql
本地的MySQL，不清楚你说的是什么

replies.txt_content:
